tagline: A language with roots in Central Asia spoken by over 75 million people.
The language of music, art, and culinary delight.
Spoken by more than 80 million people, featuring its own unique script, Hangul.
One of the six official language of the United Nations.
The sixth most spoken language in the world, with roots in Iberian Peninsula.
The lingua franca of the Indian subcontinent and beyond.
A central Semitic language that first emerged in the 1st to 4th centuries CE.
Known for its complex writing system blending three scripts.
The most widely spoken native language in Europe.
An official language in 29 countries across multiple continents.
The most spoken language in the world by number of native speakers.
The second most spoken language by number of native speakers globally.
